item.title: About
item.description: I studied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning from 2019 to 2024 at the Coimbatore Institute of Technology, and started working as a AI Engineer soon after. Experience RocketFrog.ai 06/24 - present | India AI researcher/Engineer Sayvai 06/23 - 05/24 | India AI Researcher/Engineer Bosch Global Software Technologies 07/22 - 12/22 | India AI/ML Intern Education Coimbatore Institute of Technology 2019 - 2024 Master’s degree in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
